channel.title: The Ultimate Podcast : All UFC All The Time; MMA
channel.itunes:author: Gary Alexander
channel.description: The Ultimate Podcast (UPC) is the home to all things UFC (Ultimate Fighting Championship). Fighter interviews, news, previews, and post fight annalysis. UFC stars such as Chuck Liddell, Matt Hughes, Rich Franklin, Tim Sylvia, Andrei Arlovsky, Keith Jardine, Kenny Florian, Mark Dellagrotte, Greg Jackson, and everyone else who is Anyone in UFC stops by and kicks it with your host, Gary ALexander.The Ultimate Podcast was born in the combat gyms in the Fight Capital of the World, Las Vegas! The “UPC” is hosted by Gary Alexander, an opinionated guy who is lucky enough to frequent the gyms in his home town of Las Vegas, the fight capital of the world. The Ultimate Podcast (UPC) concentrates on the UFC, with previews of upcoming fights, post fight analysis, and interviews from the ever growing stable of UFC fighters. Previously featured on UPC were Chuck Liddell, Rich Franklin, Matt Hughes, Andrei Arlovski, Tim Silvia, George Gurgel, Josh Burkman, Joe Stevenson, Brad Imes, Keith Jardine, Greg Jackson, Diego Sanchez, Herb Dean, Big John McCarthy, Kendall Grove, Ross Pointon, Solimon Hutchinson, and the list goes on and on.With a basic who’s who from the UFC on the interview list, Gary and the UPC have blazon a trail of their own with a new attitude on how Mixed Martial Arts is covered and talked about in the media. Gary’s style of interview sets him apart from other “Combat Sport reporters”, and being a fellow athlete who trains in the gyms with fighters, he gets a mutual respect that is earned, and well deserved.
channel.itunes:subtitle: All UFC All The Time;MMA
channel.itunes:summary: All UFC news, interviews from your favorite UFC fighters. The Ultimate Podcast : www.undisputedfightwear.com,For all news on the UFC, Spike TV's The Ultimate Fighter, and MMA (mixed martial arts) news on your favorite fighters such as Chuck Liddell, Randy Couture, Tito Ortiz, BJ Penn and Many More. Previews of fights, and post fight analysis. UPC, The Ultimate Podcast. Hosted by Gary Alexander, BJJ, Brazilian jui jitsu, wrestling, boxing, kickboxing, MMA, mixed martial arts.

image.title: The Ultimate Podcast : All UFC All The Time; MMA

channel.itunes:keywords: UFC, MMA, Wrestling, Boxing, Fighting, Ultimate, Podcast, Fighting, Championship, Fighter, Gary, Alexander

Gary recaps UFC and talks to Big Nog about his victory over Tim Silvia

item.title: UPC72-Year End 2007
item.itunes:author: Gary Alexander
item.description:
Hendo, The Heat, The Cali Kid, The Muscle Shark, and The American Physco join Gary Alexander on this year end episode of The Ultimate Podcast. thanks to all of you for listening, participating, leaving great comments on itunes, watching the videos for the mma show on itunes as well. Thanks to all of the fighters for joining us, thanks to Dominance fight gear, Triggonomics, Punishment Athletics, Xtreme Couture, Unbreakable Mouth Peices, Battle Born, MMA Authentics, Heavy Hitters, Cryogel, Pure Sanitizer, Punch USA,Clinch Gear, Gameness and THROWDOWN. www.themmashow.com www.themmashow.com www.myspace.com/theultimatepodcast Voice mail call in line 206 600 6793

Happy new year

Gary Alexander
